title: Bacon, mushroom and herb stuffing
ingredients: ['1/2 tablespoon olive oil', '250g thick smoked bacon, chopped or lardons', '10 to 12 mushrooms, brushed clean, diced', '120g butter', '2 large onions, peeled and diced', '3 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves', '4 fresh sage leaves, sliced', '350g breadcrumbs', 'salt and pepper to taste']
